remarks: The Cartesian product of the domain and range of a relation is an upper bound for its transitive closure.  (Contributed by RP, 2-Jan-2020.) (Revised by RP, 28-Apr-2020.)
statement:
trclub.rel $e |- Rel R $.
trclub.rex $e |- R e. V $.
trclubi $p |- |^| { s | ( R C_ s /\ ( s o. s ) C_ s ) } C_ ( dom R X. ran R ) $.
$d R s $.
